annotations.description: An often overlooked Prohibition Era cocktail worth reconsideration! The Twelve Mile limit was purportedly created by writer and war correspondent Tommy Milla...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: 12 Mile Limit

annotations.description: It's Repeal Day, December 5th, and to celebrate I'm talking a little about Prohibition and making SIX drinks to help you party like Gatsby! Way back in 1933 ...
annotations.title: The Drinks of Prohibition! Repeal Day Special! | How to Drink

textContent:
Twelve Mile Limit
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lemon Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Grenadine
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Cognac
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Rye

Shake & Strain
Garnish with Lemon Twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Zik8fgGUOg

---

1oz (30ml) Light Rum
.5oz (15ml) Rye Whiskey
.5oz (15ml) Brandy
.5oz (15ml) Grenadine
.5oz (15ml) Lemon Juice

Shake and strain. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j1SEi3R9wP0
title: 12 Mile Limit
